bill.summary:
Recent Grads in Start-Ups and Innovation Act
This bill amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to allow a no-interest deferment of federal student loans for a recent college graduate who owns a small business that has at least one employee other than the owner and is located in a qualified opportunity zone.
